para: The Boundary_Analysis menu contains commands that perform operation on Outputs on the boundaries of a &mesh;, which are implicitly defined by its &skel; boundaries.

The boundary analysis commands compute quantities that can be useful to know when finding the effective modulus of a material, namely the average of a &field; over a boundary and the integral of a &flux;. &oof2; does not actually compute effective moduli, because that calculation depends on certain assumptions that it cannot make.
